org.echo.mobile.framework.model.socketoperations

Class AccountBalancesSocketOperation

  • SocketOperation
    • org.echo.mobile.framework.model.socketoperations.AccountBalancesSocketOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonDeserializable<T>, JsonSerializable

    public class AccountBalancesSocketOperation
extends SocketOperation

    This function fetches all relevant class Account objects for the given accounts, and subscribes to updates to the given accounts. If any of the strings in nameOrId cannot be tied to an account, that input will be ignored. All other accounts will be retrieved and subscribed.

    See Also:
    class Account

    • Constructor Detail

      • AccountBalancesSocketOperation

        public AccountBalancesSocketOperation(int apiId,
                                      java.lang.String nameOrId,
                                      java.lang.String asset,
                                      boolean shouldSubscribe,
                                      int callId,
                                      Callback<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.AssetAmount> callback)

        This function fetches all relevant class Account objects for the given accounts, and subscribes to updates to the given accounts. If any of the strings in nameOrId cannot be tied to an account, that input will be ignored. All other accounts will be retrieved and subscribed.

        Parameters:
        apiId - Blockchain api id, which contains operation
        nameOrId - Object if of required account!
        asset - Required asset type
        shouldSubscribe - Flag of subscription on updates
        nameOrId - Object if of required account!
        asset - Required asset type
        shouldSubscribe - Flag of subscription on updates
        See Also:
        class Account
